english.segment1: Another Day slips away. and i get this feeling that nothing has changed. but these years keep coming like waves. they wash over me day after day. i just watch them rolling by. standing here beneath the sky
english.segment2: and i cant hold the hands of time. they will move like they will move. but i can hold your hand in mine. give my time and give my heart. its all that i can do
english.segment3: another night is flying by. somebody's born, somebody dies. i wanna look deep in your eyes. i wanna live and i want to cry
english.segment4: and i cant hold the hands of time. they will move like they will move. but i can hold your hand in mine. give my time and give my heart. its all that i can do
english.segment5: ill just watch it rolling by. here with you beneath the sky
english.segment6: and i cant hold the hands of time. they will move like they will move. but i can hold your hand in mine. give my time and give my heart. its all that i can do
english.segment7: Oh, take my time. Take my heart. Cuz they belong to you. It's all that I can do
